ygData.subject: Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, guess I ll stop lurking here and chime in =) ... Congrats.  Bubble away from 42 myself =) ... Bzzzz, wrong answer.  40 or 41 are both crappy songs. 40 is
ygData.messageBody:
Well, guess I'll stop lurking here and chime in =)

> Can I request a kabong of the fear topic? (I gotta
> learn to keep my mouth
> shut)
> A few questions.
>
> I am about to break out of 40 (like 3/4 bub left, it
> should fall tonight no
> problem)

Congrats. Bubble away from 42 myself =)

> Which means I will learn Max's Beserker Cresendo
> soon. When i am the haster
> (IE no enchanter in group) I use Celerity now (which
> i LOVE, the agi buff
> gives a nice ac boost). Do the experienced (I aask
> since its high level
> song) bards think Besrker is better? (it gives str
> boost I think the haste
> effect is the same)
> (This is excluding the obvious benefit of guildmates
> saying "Olaf, do
> Beserker.")

Bzzzz, wrong answer. 40 or 41 are both crappy songs.
40 is single target dispell which doesn't work and 41
is a psalm of something I believe (yep, confirmed it
on the song analysis page).

As to your question, looks like you will trade the +23
agility and 20% speed for 6 AC, +15 strength, and 17%
haste. I'm going for berserkers the moment I get it.


> Loot: I need to upgrade my belt, back and
> shoulders. What do you all
> reccomend out there? I like maxing my AC, Resists,
> CHA, and STR (in that
> order). Right now I have a Kunzar Mantle (idiot me
> looted it not knowing it
> was no drop) (ac7, wis,dex,agi +3), a splinted
> bronze cloak (UGH!) and a
> straw spun belt (ac 10, but weighs 6...). I have
> about 2k right now and
> dont really have trouble making money, though I
> would rather go get a guild
> run to get new items... Any suggestions?

Well, for shoulders I'm wearing crested spaulders. 11
AC +5 or 6 stamina. Not a bad item I think and it's
selling for fairly cheap these days. As to back, I'm
clueless on what to go for. I'm wearing a cloak of
the icebear which has a nice cold protection to it.
As to belt, I'm camping the thick banded belt. That
+15 strength just makes me DROOL. Course, I'm also
trying to get into the frenzied groups so I'm either
going for a FBSS (+20% haste can't hurt) or the TBB
(+15 strength /cheer).

Mind you I try to avoid kunark now. Max damage from a
kunark mob at my level seems to be 107. Max damage
from an old world mob seems to be 86. I'll wait till
46 to go to Karnor's to go back to Kunark.

> Elfson Allegro
> Bard of Norrath since December. Well not including
> March and April.

Centiera D'Winter
41st Half-Elf Bard
Bristlebane
